objects.text: Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs
Elegant Design | Perfect Gift for Her | 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, elegant design targeting jewelry shoppers, especially for gifting purposes. The layout is centered and uses curved floral and sparkle-inspired graphics to frame the product visually. At the top lies a bold, standout title (`heading`) in dark mauve, followed by a descriptive subheading (`subheading`) in a serif font, expressing luxury and femininity. The center prominently showcases the product image (`product_image`), surrounded by soft concentric gradient rings and waves for a dreamy effect. Below the image is a brief feature line (`description`) and a noticeable price in bold (`price`). The call-to-action (`cta`) button is rectangular with rounded corners layered over a button background (`cta_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#FFD1DC`  
- Soft Blush: `#FFF0F5`  
- Deep Mauve: `#C85B76`  
- Wine Red: `#A44360`  
- Light Petal Pink: `#FF7394`  
- White Text Accent: `#FFF0F5`
product_color: The product image displays elegant earrings featuring a delicate blend of rose gold and crystal-clear elements that create a soft, luxurious feel. The rose gold (Hex: #F3A6A0) forms the base, outlining the shape and providing a warm, sophisticated glow. Sparkling white crystals (Hex: #FFFFFF) are strategically placed to create contrast and highlight the intricate details. The pink enamel teardrop (Hex: #FDC4C4) adds a soft pop of color, contributing to a romantic and feminine tone. The color palette—rose gold, blush pink, and dazzling white—blends harmoniously, complementing each other while enhancing shine and elegance, ideal for a premium and chic advertisement banner.
